author: karalabe
content:
Doing some polishes in Geth's VM code. I kind of realized that there's an opcode assymetry:

We have BASEFEE and GASPRICE
But we only have BLOBBASEFEE and have no BLOBGASPRICE

Would it make sense to add the latter to make thing symemtric and expose the blob fee cap to the EVM too?

author: karalabe
content: or call it BLOBFEECAP for all it matters

author: yperbasis
content: There's no priority fee for blob gas, so no distinction between blob base fee and effective fee.

author: karalabe
content: Ah yeah. no way to retrieve the gasfeecap either, ok

author: _shemnon
content: So MEV markets will need to get the tip from the transaction delivering the blob rather than the blob itself then?
